data.june 24, 2025:
release v1.4.0 
- changes how sessions are visualised 
- added option to turn off sounds 
- changed 'auto advance session' to 'automatic sessions' 
- fixes mobile visuals 
- rounded the left top corner 
- fixes problem where timer could be 0
data.june 20, 2025:
release v1.3.1 
- fixed wrong time bug when auto advance is turned on 
- stops timer when mode is switched
data.june 4, 2025:
release v1.3.0 
- added sessions 
- added option to auto advance to next session 
- added options to auto start timer 
- added skip button
data.june 3, 2025:
release v1.2.0 
- added support for phones 
- added typable slider value 
- visual improvements
data.may 7, 2025:
release v1.1.0 
- settings will now be saved
data.may 6, 2025:
release v1.0.0 
- added timer 
- added modes focus, rest and long rest 
- added settings screen 
- added custom time settings
